info.brief_description: A high school boy discovers that he can pause and manipulate time to fuck anyone he wants!
info.description:
Hello, and welcome to my Time-related fetish interactive. In this story, you take the role of Ryan, a high school boy who has recently discovered his ability to mess with the flow of time. Being the horny teen that he is, he uses it almost entirely in a sexual manner, boning any women he wants while occasionally using it for revenge.

His powers are as follows

Time Freeze: Ryan can freeze time, allowing him to fuck with anyone. Frozen people have no knowledge of what is going on. This power activates anytime Ryan gets an erection and time will not restart unless he blows his load in some manner.
Rapid Age: If Ryan touches something and focuses, he can cause it to rapidly age. This applies to people and to objects and also to parts of objections; if Ryan wanted to age a woman's chest, he could do so.
Rapid De-Age: Same as the above, but for age regression.
Time Jump: Ryan can jump into different periods of history and different places in the world

Those are the four basic powers, though he can discover more along the way. Furthermore, it is possible he may me people with the same or different powers, such as shrinking or the like.

In terms of rules and content limit, all I ask is that you use proper grammar and keep the story mainly time related.
